tables.columns: id, name, email, password, role[admin, teacher, student], is_verified, otp_code, created_at
id, teacher_id, title, description, answer_key_json, duration_minutes, fee, created_at
id, user_id, exam_id, ai_score, ai_feedback, status[started, submitted, graded], created_at
id, attempt_id, event_type[alt-tab, face_missing, multi_face], snapshot_url, timestamp

backend_execution_logic.authentication: JWT-Auth with Gmail OTP requirement via Middleware

dashboard_data_strategy.student: Query available exams using 'whereDoesntHave' attempts; fetch personal attempts with 'exam' eager-loaded.
dashboard_data_strategy.teacher: Query owned exams with 'withCount(attempts)'; fetch latest 10 ProctorLogs via 'Attempt.Exam' relationship filtering.
dashboard_data_strategy.real_time: Use Redis for caching session heartbeats for the 5000 concurrent users.

ai_grading_engine.logic: Queue-based processing. Compare 'student_answer' against 'exams.answer_key_json'. Output: Integer score + 2-sentence feedback.

frontend_execution_logic.state_management: Zustand with Persistence for Exam Interface

core_components.proctoring: TensorFlow.js BlazeFace for local monitoring; trigger 'POST /proctor/log' only on violation.
core_components.security: Window blur detection for Alt-Tab; auto-submit on 3rd violation.
core_components.data_fetching: Axios interceptors for JWT; exact mapping to Laravel API Resources.

pages: Student Dashboard: Dynamic cards for 'Available Exams' and 'My Results'.
Exam Interface: Locked full-screen, sidebar question navigator, webcam overlay.

integration_requirements.payment: Stripe/SSLCommerz integration; lock 'Start Exam' until 'transactions.status' is success.
integration_requirements.storage: AWS S3 for proctoring snapshots (Public/Private signed URLs).

governance.no_mock_data: All controllers must use Eloquent queries. UI must use real API response shapes.
governance.security_first: Sanitize all descriptive inputs; enforce Rate Limiting (5000req/min) on heartbeat endpoints.
